name: LockDown 2.0
description:
The World is Full of Coronavirus, use the Open Containment Zone to Pack out People and Save them from Virus. Controls:-  1. Mouse Drag  - Moves the Hand around for Pickup. 2. W,A,S,D - To Rotate Containment. 3. Space - To Spray Bubbles. 4. C - To Close Containment Zone.

Credits for Artwork:- 

1.  Virus Image :- FreePik.com

2. Emoji :- FreePik.com

Music :- Made with GroovePad App from PlayStore.
